objects.text: Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs
• 925 Sterling Silver • Gift for Women • Certificate of Authenticity

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 67 ratings.

banner_details:
This elegant banner features a feminine and luxurious design with a radial pastel pink background accentuated by soft geometric elements and circle strokes for added depth. At the top, the "heading" text layer showcases the brand name in a bold serif font in a vibrant purple tone, creating a premium appeal. Below, the "subheading" text introduces the featured product using a refined, legible serif in a deep rose color. Centrally placed is the "product_image" of a jewel pair, encased within a soft white circular frame. The "price" is highlighted within a bordered white circle, symbolizing emphasis and urgency. Supporting this, the "description" text provides concise feature highlights across the bottom, and a magenta-colored rectangular "cta_background" houses the "cta" prompting action, adding contrast and visibility.

**Color Palette:**
- #FFF0F5 – Lavender Blush (background highlight)
- #FFD1DC – Soft Pink (gradient wash)
- #9C27B0 – Vivid Purple (brand heading)
- #880E4F – Deep Rose (price and secondary text)
- #FFFFFF – White (text contrast and container clarity)
- #C2185B – Bold Fuchsia (CTA and accent)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of earrings with an elegant and feminine design, primarily highlighted by a rose gold base (#F4A6A0) that adds warmth and sophistication. The rose gold metal elegantly frames soft, milky pink enamel detailing (#F7C6CD), imparting a delicate floral essence. Sparkling white gemstones (#FFFFFF) and clear crystals (#E0E0E0) are embedded around the circle, providing a bright contrast that enhances the metallic shine and gives a luxurious appeal. The colors are well-balanced—rose tones create soft warmth while the whites inject brilliance—allowing the product to shine cohesively. Ideal palette for advertising: rose gold, blush pink, crystal white.
